sourcesContent:
<!-- ----Erdgeschoss.vue---------------------2021-12-28----- -->
<template>

  <svg width="100%" viewBox="-10 -10 1760 1520">
    <rect class="ciBackground" x="-10" y="-10" width="1770" height="1530" />
    <!--Reihe 0-->
    <CiWall :x="0*dx"  :y="0*dy" sid="w" type="9" :fx="33" :fy="5"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="2*dx"  :y="0*dy" sid="w" type="13" :fy="5"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="5*dx"  :y="0*dy" sid="w" type="13" :fy="5"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="10*dx" :y="0*dy" sid="w" type="13" :fy="7"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="17*dx" :y="0*dy" sid="w" type="12" :fy="7"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 3-->
    <CiWall :x="0*dx" :y="3*dy" sid="w" type="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="2*dx" :y="3*dy" sid="w" type="14"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 4-->
    <CiWall :x="2*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="3*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="5"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="4*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="5"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="5*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="15" :fy=7></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="7*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="13" :fx="5"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="10*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="7"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="11*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="13" :fy="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="13*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="5" :fx="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="16*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="13"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="17*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="w" type="6"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 6-->
    <CiWall :x="7*dx" :y="6*dy" sid="w" type="11" :fy="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="9*dx" :y="6*dy" sid="w" type="13" :fy="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="11*dx" :y="6*dy" sid="w" type="14"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="16*dx" :y="6*dy" sid="w" type="10" :fy="2"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 8-->
    <CiWall :x="5*dx" :y="8*dy" sid="w" type="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="7*dx" :y="8*dy" sid="w" type="7" :fx="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="9*dx" :y="8*dy" sid="w" type="7"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="11*dx" :y="8*dy" sid="w" type="12" :fy="13"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 9-->
    <CiWall :x="14*dx" :y="9*dy" sid="w" type="9" :fx="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="16*dx" :y="9*dy" sid="w" type="14"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 10-->
    <CiWall :x="14*dx" :y="10*dy" sid="w" type="67" :fx="3"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="16*dx" :y="10*dy" sid="w" type="14" :fy="7"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 11-->
    <CiWall :x="11*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="w" type="11"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="13*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="w" type="28"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 12-->
    <CiWall :x="13*dx" :y="12*dy" sid="w" type="11" :fx="5"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="16*dx" :y="12*dy" sid="w" type="14"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 13-->
    <CiWall :x="13*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="w" type="130"></CiWall>
    <!--Reihe 15-->
    <CiWall :x="11*dx" :y="15*dy" sid="w" type="3" :fx="9"></CiWall>
    <CiWall :x="16*dx" :y="15*dy" sid="w" type="6"></CiWall>

    <!-- Vorraum-Arbeitszimmer Tuere-->
    <CiDoor :x="12*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="te1ar1" door-dir="h4" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="12*dx" :y="5*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="h4" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <!-- Erdgeschoss: Bereich 1, Eingang vorne-->
    <CiDoor :x="10*dx" :y="8*dy" sid="te1vo1" door-dir="H1" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <!-- Erdgeschoss: Bereich 1, Eingang hinten-->
    <CiDoor :x="16*dx" :y="5*dy" sid="te1vo2" door-dir="V2" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <!-- Vorraum-Wohnzimmer Tuere-->
    <CiDoor :x="11.55*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1wo2zb" door-dir="H4" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="12.4*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1wo1zb" door-dir="h3" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="12*dx" :y="10*dy" sid="te1wo1" door-dir="h3" :border="0"></CiDoor>

    <!-- Wettersensoren -->
    <CiWeather :x="10*dx" :y="10*dy" sid="wetter1" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="12*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="wetter2" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="3*dx" :y="3*dy" sid="wetter3" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="17*dx" :y="5*dy" sid="wetter4" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="7*dx" :y="10*dy" sid="wetter6" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="13*dx" :y="3*dy" sid="wetter7" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="14*dx" :y="3*dy" sid="wetter8" :border="0"></CiWeather>

    <CiLamp :x="16*dx" :y="2*dy" sid="le1ar3" :border="0" lines="1"></CiLamp>

    <CiMotion :x="11*dx" :y="1*dx" sid="bewegung2"></CiMotion>
    <CiMotion :x="15*dx" :y="6*dx" sid="bewegung1"></CiMotion>
    <CiMotion :x="14*dx" :y="6*dx" sid="bewegung3"></CiMotion>

    <CiButton  :x="11*dx" :y="3*dy" sid="be1ar1" lines="1" :border="0"></CiButton>
    <CiButton  :x="17*dx" :y="6*dy" sid="be1voro1" lines="0" :border="0"></CiButton>
    <CiButton  :x="17*dx" :y="7*dy" sid="be1voro2" lines="0" :border="0"></CiButton>

    <CiBlind :x="16*dx" :y="7.8*dy" :f="2" sid="re1vo1" blind-dir="V1" :border="0"></CiBlind>
    <CiBlind :x="16*dx" :y="14*dy" sid="re1wo1" blind-dir="V1" :border="0"></CiBlind>

    <!-- stiege -->
    <rect @click="showKeller()" id="e2su" x="1350" y="685" width="200" height="100" fill="gold" stroke="gold" stroke-width="2"/>
    <rect @click="showStock1()" id="e2so" x="1350" y="785" width="200" height="100" fill="yellow" stroke="yellow" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text @click="showKeller()" x="1355" y="765" textLength="190" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" class="styleStiege">Keller</text>
    <text @click="showStock1()" x="1355" y="865" textLength="190" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" class="styleStiege">1.Stock</text>

    <!-- Erdgeschoss: Bereich 1, WC -->
    <CiDoor :x="14*dx" :y="9.5*dy" sid="te1wc1" door-dir="v3" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <!-- Erdgeschoss: Bereich 1, Bad -->
    <CiDoor :x="13.5*dx" :y="10.5*dy" sid="te1ba1" door-dir="d1y" :border="0"></CiDoor>

    <!-- Huette -->
    <CiLamp :x="1*dx" :y="1*dy" sid="le3hu1" :border="0" lines="0"></CiLamp>
    <CiDoor :x="1*dx" :y="3*dy" sid="te3hu1" door-dir="H3" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiWeather :x="1*dx" :y="2*dy" sid="weatherhutin" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="1*dx" :y="4*dy" sid="weatherhutout" :border="0"></CiWeather>

<!--
    <CiDoor :x="1*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="d1x" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="2*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="d1y" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="3*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="d2x" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="4*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="d2y" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="5*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="d3x" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="6*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="d3y" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="7*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="d4x" :border="0"></CiDoor>
    <CiDoor :x="8*dx" :y="11*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" door-dir="d4y" :border="0"></CiDoor>

    <CiWindow :x="1*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d1x" type="rect" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="2*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d1y" type="rect" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="3*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d2x" type="rect" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="4*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d2y" type="rect" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="5*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d3x" type="rect" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="6*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d3y" type="rect" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="7*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d4x" type="rect" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="8*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d4y" type="rect" :border="0"></CiWindow>

    <CiWindow :x="1*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d1x" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="2*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d1y" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="3*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d2x" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="4*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d2y" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="5*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d3x" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="6*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d3y" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="7*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d4x" :border="0"></CiWindow>
    <CiWindow :x="8*dx" :y="13*dy" sid="te1ar1zb" window-dir="d4y" :border="0"></CiWindow>
-->
</svg>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { defineComponent } from 'vue'
import { Geo } from '@/components/CiBase.vue'
import CiWall from '@/components/CiWall.vue'
import CiDoor from '@/components/CiDoor.vue'
import CiLamp from '@/components/CiLamp.vue'
import CiWeather from '@/components/CiWeather.vue'
import CiMotion from '@/components/CiMotion.vue'
import CiButton from '@/components/CiButton.vue'
import CiBlind from '@/components/CiBlind.vue'
// import CiWindow from '@/components/CiWindow.vue'

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'Erdgeschoss',
  components: {
    CiWall,
    CiDoor,
    // CiWindow,
    CiLamp,
    CiWeather,
    CiMotion,
    CiButton,
    CiBlind
  },
  computed: {
    geo: function (): Geo {
      const geo1 = new Geo(0, 0)
      return geo1
    },
    dx: function (): number { return (this.geo.dxo) },
    dy: function (): number { return (this.geo.dyo) }
  },
  methods: {
    showStock1: function () {
      console.log('CLICK - showStock1', '')
      this.$router.push({ name: 'Stock1' })
    },
    showKeller: function () {
      console.log('CLICK - showKeller!', '')
      this.$router.push({ name: 'Keller' })
    }
  }
})
</script>

<style scoped>
 .styleStiege { font: bold 60px sans-serif; fill: red; cursor: pointer; }

 #e2su {
   cursor: pointer;
 }
</style>
